After a relatively disappointing Thai (Gardens) Barcelona, this authentic little place proclaiming "real Thai cuisine" was indeed that: friendly, gracious service, reasonable prices and delicious home cooking. They asked for each dish if we wanted it spicy or not ( Thai Gardens didn't) and brought it as hot as it should be. Price was right too, and a 4 minute taxi ride from Passage dei Gracia. Excellent som tam, Massaman Thai Kai and must less expensive than the (err) competition...
